utilities.array2d
Interface IndexStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
IndexStrategy.CIndexStrategy, IndexStrategy.FortranIndexStrategy
public interface IndexStrategy

allow different index orderings to access items of an array2d

Author:
Jan Hegewald

Nested Class Summary
static class IndexStrategy.CIndexStrategy
          C-style index calculation, use
for ix in lx
for iy in ly
array[ix][iy] = ...
static class IndexStrategy.FortranIndexStrategy
          fortran-style index calculation, use
for iy in ly
for ix in lx
array[ix][iy] = ...
